translation.en: Johnny English.
Five years ago, he was our top agent.
Yeah.
Took his eye off the ball in Mozambique.
translation.ko: 그래, 모잠비크에서 일을 완전히 망쳤지 “모잠비크 - 2006년 10월 극비”

translation.en: Does it have to be him?
He's the only one our contact will talk to.
So where is he?
You came here to forget your life of shame.
translation.ko: “티베트 산악 지대” 너는 부끄러운 삶을 잊으려고 여기 왔다

translation.en: But the path you must tread... to new life... will be not be easy, English.
translation.ko: 그러나 새로운 삶으로 이르는 길은 쉽지 않을 것이다, 잉글리쉬

translation.en: Our purpose here is simple-- to strengthen what is weak,
translation.ko: 우리의 목표는 단순하다 약한 것을 강하게 만든다

translation.en: make hard what is soft.
This will take time.
Mind... must be master of the body.
Strong mind can separate the body... from its suffering.
translation.ko: 강한 마음은 육체를 고통으로부터 분리할 수 있다

translation.en: Good concentration, English.
Sorry? [ GASPS ] Hot! Hot! Hot, hot!
translation.ko: 네? 앗, 뜨, 뜨, 뜨, 뜨거워!

translation.en: You are not young.
But with age... comes wisdom.
When mind is master of the body,
you will be warrior once more.
Master, what is my destiny?
I'm in touch with a higher power.
translation.ko: 나는 저 높은 곳과 상통하고 있다

translation.en: MI7 wants you... on the first flight back to London.
translation.ko: 첫 비행기를 타고 런던으로 귀환하라는 MI7의 명령이다

translation.en: Master, am I ready?
No.
Window seat or aisle?
[ WOMAN ] One moment, please. Good morning, sir.
Toshiba British Intelligence.
For electronic products, press one.
To speak to an agent, press two.
Toshiba British Intelligence. Certainly, sir.
translation.ko: “국민을 위해 염탐 중” 물론입니다 저희 웹사이트로 연결해드릴까요?

translation.en: Can I redirect you to our Web site--
www.spyingforyou.gov.uk.
Toshiba British Intelligence.
- Good morning, sir. Can I help you? - Johnny English.
Pegasus is expecting you.
Look into the camera.
Don't smile.
Pamela Thornton, Head of MI7.
Johnny English.
Have a seat.
You've been away for some time, English.
But you haven't been forgotten. Hmm.
Come on. [ YOWLS ]
People here often talk about your adventures in Mozambique.
translation.ko: 자네가 모잠비크에서 벌인 모험 얘길 자주 들었어

translation.en: Well, MI7 has come a long way since then.
translation.ko: 그 이후로 MI7에 많은 변화가 있었지

translation.en: The guns, the fast cars and the chauvinism are all on their way out.
translation.ko: 총, 빠른 차, 남성 우월주의는 옛날얘기야

translation.en: Frankly, I didn't want to see you back.
translation.ko: 솔직히 말해서 난 자네의 복직이 싫었어

translation.en: You are everything I came into this service to change.
translation.ko: 자네는 내가 바꾸려 했던 모든 것의 전형이니까

translation.en: But my hands are tied-- [ YOWLS ]
and there are times when one has to go against one's better judgment.
translation.ko: 때론 자기 의사에 어긋나는 일도 해야 해

translation.en: We have a situation.
Indeed.
There's a good puss. There's a good puss.
There's a good pussy. Who's a good pussy?
I'm impressed. Who's a good pussy?
Philby never lets strangers pick him up.
translation.ko: 필비는 낯선 사람 품에는 안 가는데 말이야

translation.en: Oh, I'm very much at one with the animal kingdom.
translation.ko: 저는 동물을 다루는 데 일가견이 있습니다

translation.en: Meow. There's a good puss. [ PURRING ] I know, I know. Who's lovely? Who's lovely?
translation.ko: 착하지, 야옹아, 그래, 그래 어쩜 이렇게 착할까?

translation.en: [ PURRING ] Who--
We're all lovely.
Kate Sumner, our behavioral psychologist.
I've heard a great deal about you. Glowing reports, I trust.
translation.ko: 당신 얘기를 많이 들었어요 좋은 얘기겠죠?

translation.en: Tell me, Ms. Sumner,
what exactly does a behavioral psychologist do?
translation.ko: 행동 심리학자는 정확히 무슨 일을 합니까?

translation.en: Monitor observable behavior for signs of internal psychology.
translation.ko: 외적인 행동을 관찰하여 내적인 심리를 파악하죠

translation.en: We read people. Oh.
Well, we must get together sometime. I think you'll find me a real page-turner.
translation.ko: 언제 한번 만납시다 난 책으로 치면 베스트셀러니까요

translation.en: So, Pegasus, this situation.
Ex-C.I.A. agent Titus Fisher has contacted us from Hong Kong.
translation.ko: 전 CIA 요원 타이투스 피셔가 홍콩에서 우리에게 접근했어

translation.en: He has intelligence of a plot to assassinate the Chinese premier...
translation.ko: 다음 주 영중 회담에 참가하는 중국 총리를 암살하려는

translation.en: at the Anglo-Chinese talks next week.
We need you to go and find out what he's got.
Well, in that case, Pegasus, count me in.
Agent One will meet you downstairs.
So, I just scaled the walls, blew the whole place to kingdom come.
translation.ko: 그래서 내가 벽을 타고 올라가 건물 전체를 폭삭 주저앉혔어

translation.en: An hour later, I'm sitting in the bar with a White Russian in my hand.
translation.ko: 1시간 후 난 바에 앉아 보드카 칵테일을 손에 쥐고 있었지

translation.en: Who was very lovely, too, I can tell you. [ PEOPLE LAUGHING ]
translation.ko: 아주 사랑스러운 여인도 함께 쥐고 있었어

translation.en: Simon.
Hello, Johnny!
Simon, you look wonderful.
But then you always did. Welcome back. How long has it been?
translation.ko: 멋있군 하기야 늘 그랬지 한참 만에 복귀했지?

translation.en: Oh, I don't know. Five years, three months and six days, or something.
Of course. Mozambique. ♪ [ DRUMMING ]
That was a balls-up with a cherry on top.
Come on. Let's get you sorted.
Welcome to the toy cupboard.
I won't leave you my number.
- You know Patch? - Patch Quartermain, the man himself.
translation.ko: 내 전화번호를 주면 안 되겠군 패치는 알지? 패치 쿼터메인 정말 오랜만이군

translation.en: - English. - Please, don't get up.
translation.ko: 패치 쿼터메인 정말 오랜만이군 잉글리쉬 일어나지 말게

translation.en: Oh. No chance of that.
[ CLANGING ] Lost them testing the B-6 exploding brogues.
translation.ko: B-6 폭탄 구두를 실험하다 두 다리가 날아갔어

translation.en: Oh, I'm so sorry. How are you?
Have to be this one, I'm afraid.
Lost this to the D-10 doorbell. [ CHORTLES ]
Ah. Well, it's great to see... what's left of you.
[ LAUGHS ] This is rather good fun, actually. Top speed of 60 m.p.h.,
and I've, uh, managed to add the odd thing.
This way. I haven't got all day.
Don't!
Do stop meddling, English.
Here she is. Ah. The Rolls-Royce Phantom.
Truly, the Rolls-Royce of automobiles.
Armor plating, all the bells and whistles.
translation.ko: 진짜 차 중의 차 롤스로이스로군 장갑판과 각종 장치를 달았어 ‘보닛’이라고 해봐

translation.en: - Say "bonnet." - Bonnet.
[ FEMALE VOICE ] Command accepted.
Voice activation recognizes only you.
Rolls has fitted one of their experimental engines,
the nine-liter V16. Goes like the wind--
only quieter.
Beautiful.
Keep up.
Here's what you'll be taking to Hong Kong.
Ah, yes.
A satellite receiver, tracking device,
translation.ko: - 그렇군 - 위성 수신기 추적 장치 셈텍스 폭약 껌

translation.en: uh, Semtex chewing gum.
- Now, what did I just say? - [ WHIRRING ]
That's the new P-2 digital dart gun.
Gentlemen. May I remind you all that MI7's current weapon of choice is dialogue?
translation.ko: 신사분들, 이제 MI7의 주 무기가 대화란 걸 잊으셨나?

translation.en: We do love it when you get strict, Pegasus.
translation.ko: 당신이 엄하게 나올 때가 좋아요 페가수스

translation.en: English, you go to Hong Kong tonight.
Fisher will contact you there.
To ensure protocol is observed,
I'm sending someone with you--
Agent Tucker.
translation.ko: 자네와 동행할 사람이 있어 터커 요원

translation.en: It will be an honor, sir.
Well, it'll be good to have somebody to carry the bags.
translation.ko: 가방 들어줄 사람이 있으면 좋죠, 뭐

translation.en: You made a laughingstock out of this service once, English.
translation.ko: 자넨 우리 정보부를 웃음거리로 만들었어, 잉글리쉬

translation.en: Not on my watch. Clear?
translation.ko: 내가 있는 동안은 안 돼 알아들었나?

translation.en: [ HIGH VOICE ] Crystal clear, Pegasus.
Just like old times, eh, Johnny?
I'm off to Switzerland. Let's catch up when you get back.
translation.ko: 난 스위스로 가 나중에 한 번 뭉치자고

translation.en: [ HIGH VOICE ] There's nothing I'd like more, Simon.
Anyone seen the voice-changing travel lozenges?
translation.ko: 음성 변조용 목사탕 누가 못 봤어요?

translation.en: no. Uh--
Come on, Tucker.
I'm not 21 until September, sir. I'm not really allowed in.
Tucker, you're an agent working for Her Majesty's Secret Service.
translation.ko: 전 9월이 돼야 21살입니다 아직 미성년이에요 터커, 자넨 여왕 폐하의 첩보부 요원이야

translation.en: Just act the part.
$10,000 worth, please, my lovely.
Thank you.
[ WHISPERS ] And a receipt, please.
Be alert for contact, Tucker.
We're looking for a Chinese man in spectacles.
translation.ko: 안경 쓴 중국인이야 한 잔 더 하시겠어요?

translation.en: Sir. The Chinese man in spectacles.
More beer. Yes, sir.
translation.ko: - 맥주 한 잔 더요 - 돈은 그만 거세요

translation.en: Contact.
Evening.
Your grandmother is sick.
What?
Your grandmother is sick.
Well, she's dead. That's how sick she is.
Is he dead, sir? Yes.
Hi, Mum. What's the matter?
No, no, no. Nothing's the matter. Colin.
Well, I felt a bit funny last night, but I'm okay now.
translation.ko: 어젯밤은 속이 좀 울렁거렸는데 지금은 괜찮아요

translation.en: So, what have you got for us?
The people behind the plot to kill Xiang Ping, the Chinese premier-- a group called Vortex.
translation.ko: 중국 총리 샹핑을 암살하려는 자들은 보텍스라는 단체 소속이오

translation.en: - Never heard of them. - Paid assassins.
The best there is.
Come on, Fisher. I need names. I need evidence.
translation.ko: 피셔, 이름을 대요 증거를 달란 말이오!

translation.en: Vortex has a secret weapon.
This is one of three keys that, when used together, gain access to it.
translation.ko: 이런 열쇠 3개가 모이면 그 무기에 접근할 수 있소

translation.en: Without this, Vortex is finished.
How did you get hold of it?
It's mine.
- I beg your pardon? - Vortex is three of us.
Come off it, Fisher. You, a hired assassin?
translation.ko: 이봐요, 피셔 당신이 청부 살인자라고? 코앞의 표적도 못 맞히는 주제에?

translation.en: You couldn't hit a barn door with a banana.
translation.ko: 당신이 청부 살인자라고? 코앞의 표적도 못 맞히는 주제에?

translation.en: And as for Vortex,
clearly you got the name off a box of washing powder.
translation.ko: 보텍스란 이름도 무슨 세제 이름을 본뜬 게 분명해

translation.en: Vortex was in Mozambique.
♪ [ DRUMMING ] What?
Yeah? Really?
Mum-- Mum, I've got to go. Gotta--
- We were all there that day, Johnny Boy. - Excuse me!
translation.ko: 그날 우리 셋 다 출동했소 - 실례해요! - 뭐라고?

translation.en: What?
- Sir, there's a-- - Quick! Come on!
Come on!
Madam, let me help you with that. Here, yes.
translation.ko: 부인 제가 도와드리죠 이리 오세요 어서 여기서 나가세요

translation.en: I think you should vacate the area.
There are some very dangerous people about.
There we go.
Get after her, Tucker! Get after her!
What?
- Sir! Sir! - Over here, Tucker.
- I lost her, sir. - Look what I found.
translation.ko: 여기야, 터커! 여자를 놓쳤어요 대신 이자를 잡았지

translation.en: This way, sir! This way!
You get down to the street. I'll take the roof.
translation.ko: 자넨 거리로 내려가 난 지붕으로 갈게

translation.en: [ TIBETAN TEACHER'S VOICE ] You are not young.
But with age comes wisdom.
[ TRIGGER COCKS ] Hand it over, chimp.
Come on, Tucker.
[ MOTOR REVS ] Can I help?
I'm commandeering this vessel in the name of Her Majesty.
translation.ko: 여왕 폐하의 이름으로 이 배를 징발하겠소

translation.en: Oh, righto, Wing Commander.
[ WOMAN ] How exciting!
Now, what's your poison? Can I get you something?
Um, we've got vodka, rum--
Your safety is our priority.
But you can help us by familiarizing yourself with this leaflet.
Crème de menthe, a smidgen of port, and that's about it, I'm afraid.
translation.ko: 박하 크림에 포트와인 약간 뭐, 그 정도예요

translation.en: I'm Shirley. Hello, Shirley.
Just a tad to your left, Shirley.
[ WHIRRING ] Thank you.
I say, Wing Commander! [ LAUGHING ]
- [ SHIRLEY LAUGHING ] Ah, yes! - Well played, sir! Just like a gladiator!
Come on. Put 'em up.
Well played, sir! Well played.
- More champagne, my lovely? - Certainly, sir.
Tucker, are you sure you don't want a shandy or something?
I've got to finish this mission report, sir.
And Pegasus wants to see us as soon as we touch down.
The mission report?
Come on, Tucker. Live a little.
You should learn to savor success.
Work hard,
play hard.
Isn't that right... Barbara?
Vortex is finished.
But better still,
for years I believed what happened in Mozambique was my fault.
translation.ko: 지난 몇 년 동안 모잠비크 건이 내 탓인 줄 알았는데

translation.en: Now I realize it was only partly my fault.
What did happen in Mozambique?
Excuse me, sir. We're coming in to land.
translation.ko: 실례합니다, 곧 착륙할 예정이오니 가방을 선반에 올려드릴까요?

translation.en: Can I stow that overhead for you? Certainly.
translation.ko: 실례합니다, 곧 착륙할 예정이오니 가방을 선반에 올려드릴까요? 좋소

translation.en: Sir, I don't think he's a "Susan."
But then you're not a linguist, are you, Tucker?
It's not Susan. It's "Shooshan."
From the Xinzhou region, unless I'm very much mistaken.
translation.ko: 신조우 지방 출신이지 내 말이 크게 틀리진 않을걸

translation.en: Thank you, Shooshan.
Foreign Secretary.
I hope you've got something for us, English.
translation.ko: 외무 장관님 확실한 정보를 가져왔겠지, 잉글리쉬?

translation.en: The prime minister is extremely concerned.
translation.ko: 확실한 정보를 가져왔겠지, 잉글리쉬? 수상 각하의 심려가 무척 크다네

translation.en: [ JOHNNY ] He has every reason to be so.
There is a plot to kill the Chinese premier...
masterminded by a group of ruthless assassins called Vortex.
translation.ko: 중국 총리를 암살할 음모가 있습니다 보텍스라는 잔인한 살인자 그룹이 음모를 꾸몄습니다

translation.en: Good Lord.
The danger, however, has been averted...
now that we have... this.
- English? - Now, I know what you're going to say.
It's a pretty small object.
Well, it's often the little things that pack the biggest punch.
translation.ko: 하지만 주먹은 작아도 펀치력이 엄청난 경우가 많아요

translation.en: After all... Sir!
translation.ko: 하지만 주먹은 작아도 펀치력이 엄청난 경우가 많아요 선배

translation.en: David killed Goliath with a pebble.
The mighty Vortex has been slain by my possession... of this small key.
translation.ko: 제가 이 작은 열쇠를 입수함으로써 강력한 보텍스가 끝장났습니다

translation.en: Shooshan.
Susan.
We got it, but Fisher talked.
Understood. We'll deal with English.
You've got some more cleaning to do.
Mummy, Mummy! Mr. Rhubarb's here!
Izzie, darling. Why don't you show him into the conservatory?
I'll be with you in just a minute. Okay. Come on! Let's go!
translation.ko: 엄마도 금방 갈게 알았어요 어서 가요!

translation.en: Come with us, Mr. Rhubarb.
Perhaps when you've found your key, you'll give me a call.
I'm very sorry, Foreign Secretary. I'd hoped to have more for you.
translation.ko: 정말 죄송합니다, 장관님 더 많은 정보를 드렸어야 했는데

translation.en: Clearly there has been a misunderstanding. Oh, God.
Pegasus! I've got her!
- Come on, you witch! - English?
She was in Hong Kong! She's the killer!
translation.ko: 홍콩에도 나타났던 여자예요! 이 여자가 살인범이에요!

translation.en: She's my mother!
Couldn't she be both?
Mummy! Mummy, are you all right?
[ PANTING ] Should we get you a cup of tea?
You'll be fine, Mummy. [ MUMMY ] Who was that man?
translation.ko: - 괜찮을 거예요, 엄마 - 저 남자 뭐야?

translation.en: I think a cup of tea, that's what's required.
translation.ko: 차 한잔 마시면 괜찮을 것 같군요

translation.en: Pegasus, I am truly, truly sorry.
Don't apologize to me. Apologize to her.
I cannot apologize enough, Mrs., uh, Pegasus.
translation.ko: 뭐라고 사죄드려야 할지 모르겠군요, 페가수스 부인

translation.en: It was a simple case of mistaken identity, I'm afraid.
Now, I completely understand how upset you are,
- Sir? - Tucker!
That's her! It's the killer from Hong Kong!
translation.ko: 터커, 저 여자야! 홍콩에서 만난 살인자야!

translation.en: No, it's not her, sir. It is! This time it's really her!
- It's not her, sir! - Yes, it is!
Make way! Uh-- Sir!
You murderous crone!
- Take that and that! - [ CHILDREN SCREAMING ]
English!
[ GAGGING ] I've got her this time, Pegasus!
This is the witch who works for Vortex! [ WHIMPERING ]
Want any more, you old hag?
- English! - Granny!
You humiliate me in front of the foreign secretary,
translation.ko: 자넨 외무 장관 앞에서 날 굴욕스럽게 만들었고

translation.en: you lose our only lead on Vortex,
translation.ko: 자넨 외무 장관 앞에서 날 굴욕스럽게 만들었고 보텍스에 관한 단서를 잃었고 우리 엄마를 죽이려고 했어!

translation.en: and then you try and kill my mother!
translation.ko: 보텍스에 관한 단서를 잃었고 우리 엄마를 죽이려고 했어!

translation.en: Twice!
Pegasus, we have another lead. Vortex was in Mozambique!
translation.ko: 페가수스, 다른 단서가 있어요 보텍스가 모잠비크에 있었어요!

translation.en: They were responsible for the death of President Chambal!
No! You were responsible for the death of President Chambal.
translation.ko: 샹발 대통령의 죽음은 그들의 책임이에요! 아냐! 샹발 대통령의 죽음은 자네 책임이야

translation.en: Well, you certainly gave Mr. Rhubarb a run for his money.
Still, at least we know Vortex was in Mozambique.
translation.ko: 어쨌든 보텍스가 모잠비크에 있었다는 사실은 알게 됐잖아요

translation.en: When you told Pegasus, you displayed all four indicators...
translation.ko: 페가수스에게 그 말 할 때 당신은 진실을 말한다는 4가지 지표를 보여줬어요

translation.en: of someone telling the truth.
[ KATE ] This is a facial action coding system.
translation.ko: “3번 카메라 우측면 4번 카메라 좌측면” 표정 분석 장치예요 “5번 카메라 안면”

translation.en: Its high-speed cameras record micro-expressions...
invisible to the naked eye.
It detects what we call "emotional leakage."
Uh, Ms. Sumner, I'm a trained agent. I don't "leak."
translation.ko: 섬너 양, 난 숙달된 요원이라 ‘누설’ 같은 건 안 해요

translation.en: I want to take you back to Mozambique.
Is that really necessary?
- Take a look at this. - [ CHIMING ]
[ KATE ] I want to take you back to Mozambique. ♪ [ RAPID DRUMMING ]
There.
Could we call that leakage?
Now, play ball. I'm taking a risk being here after hours.
translation.ko: 시작하죠, 일과 후 여기 있는 건 저로서도 위험이에요

translation.en: If Vortex was in Mozambique, perhaps you saw something.
translation.ko: 보텍스가 모잠비크에 있었으면 분명 뭔가 봤을 거예요

translation.en: I'm going to take you back there using hypnosis.
Oh, please. Spare me the New Age mumbo jumbo.
Mr. English, please. I'm a professional.
I'm not going to just snap my fingers-- Mmm.
translation.ko: 잉글리쉬 씨 전 프로예요 그냥 손가락 튕겨서

translation.en: and make you say the first thing that comes into your head.
translation.ko: 머리에 떠오르는 얘기를 늘어놓도록 하진 않을 거예요

translation.en: Plump pillows.
Excuse me?
Brilliant mind. Beautiful face.
Incredible.
And completely out of my league.
I'd like to take you back to Mozambique.
Tell me what's happening, Johnny. Where are you?
translation.ko: 현 상황을 얘기해요, 쟈니 지금 어디 있죠?

translation.en: President Chambal's inauguration day.
Yes. You are head of security.
Everything's going perfectly.
Today we climb the mountain!
[ CROWD CHEERING ] Agent English.
The people have spoken, and the message is clear.
The backup electrical supply has been cut.
translation.ko: 평화와 번영의 미래를 열어갑시다! 보조 전력이 끊어졌어요

translation.en: No, it hasn't. It's been turned off.
Do you know how to turn it on?
I should be getting back.
Well, operations like this are always difficult.
But it's very satisfying when you get a result.
translation.ko: 이런 작전은 언제나 어려워요 하지만 결과가 좋으면 무척 만족스러워요

translation.en: The president couldn't be in safer hands.
The future belongs to Mozambique!
Thank you-- [ GUNSHOTS ]
Ah. The fireworks have begun.
The sound of freedom and celebration.
Easy, Johnny, easy. Go back. Before the Jacuzzi, what did you see?
translation.ko: 진정해요, 쟈니, 다시 돌아가죠 거품 욕조 전에 뭘 봤죠?

translation.en: [ JOHNNY ] Yes.
Fisher.
On the terrace with two others.
[ KATE ] Yes. All three members of Vortex were there that day.
translation.ko: 네, 그날 보텍스 멤버 3명이 거기 있었어요

translation.en: Who can you see?
translation.ko: 네, 그날 보텍스 멤버 3명이 거기 있었어요 누가 보이죠? 누구예요, 쟈니?

translation.en: Who can you see, Johnny?
[ JOHNNY ] Artem Karlenko.
[ PEGASUS ] Artem Karlenko, double agent.
Recruited by MI7 in Moscow.
Retired after his penchant for killing people threatened his cover.
translation.ko: 살인을 즐기는 성향 때문에 신분 노출 우려로 현역 은퇴

translation.en: Five years ago, he turned up here as Sergei Pudovkin.
translation.ko: 5년 전 여기 나타났어 세르게이 푸도프킨으로 통해

translation.en: Rich. Very rich.
A member of the exclusive Oakwood Golf Club,
which is where you'll be meeting him.
He's in a match play competition, sir.
I'm making you his opponent for the day.
Done it, sir. You're booked in as Mr. Peter Adams.
translation.ko: “피터 애덤스 대 세르게이 푸도프킨” 됐습니다, 선배 피터 애덤스로 예약됐어요

translation.en: - Thank you, Tucker. - [ BEEPING ]
If Karlenko is Vortex, I want you to bring him in... alive.
translation.ko: 카를렌코가 보텍스의 일원이라면 잡아 와, 산 채로

translation.en: Mr. Pussykin?
Pudovkin. And you must be Mr., um--
Um, Adams.
Beautiful car, Mr. Adams.
Ah, the Royce.
- [ WOMAN'S VOICE ] Ready, sir. - Thank you.
Shall we?
- Let's go. - Command accepted.
So, what line of business are you in, Mr. Adams?
Pudovkin. Uh, sorry, yes.
translation.ko: 어떤 사업을 하시나요 애덤스 씨? 푸도프킨이오

translation.en: I'm Mr. Adams, and you're Mr.--
uh, whoever you said you were.
Well-- Stop!
Oh. Sorry. I thought I'd forgotten something. Mmm.
Glove, sir?
I may not know much about golf, Tucker,
but I know how to hold the bat.
Shot, sir.
So, what line of business are you in, Mr. Puddykin?
I made my money in the removals business. Ah.
A friend of mine had shares in a removals business.
translation.ko: 제 친구도 그런 사업을 하죠 타이투스 피셔라고요

translation.en: Titus Fisher. You haven't come across him at all?
translation.ko: 제 친구도 그런 사업을 하죠 타이투스 피셔라고요 만난 적 없으신가요?

translation.en: I warn you, Mr. Adams, not to stray into the rough.
translation.ko: 조심하시오, 애덤스 씨 러프에 빠지지 마시오

translation.en: You get in there, you might never come out.
I'll bear that in mind, Mr. Puddykin.
Pudovkin. Please.
Shot!
As was my friend Fisher, actually.
In the back.
By his cleaner, of all people.
But they didn't take much.
Just a key.
Break left to right, I think.
Thank you.
In the-- In the trees.
Come on.
He can't die. He mustn't die.
translation.ko: - 맙소사 - 이 사람이 죽으면 안 돼요

translation.en: Let's get him out of here. Come on! [ GROANING ]
He's not looking good, sir.
[ LOUDLY ] We're getting you to a doctor. You'll be fine.
You do know how to fly these, sir?
It was part of basic training. Good.
It's just like riding a bike.
Yes. It's all coming back to me.
This is helicopter Golf-Hotel-Zulu-Zulu-Tango.
translation.ko: 여기는 헬리콥터 골프 호텔 줄루 줄루 탱고

translation.en: We have a casualty onboard. Request guidance to nearest hospital.
translation.ko: 부상자가 타고 있다 가장 가까운 병원으로 안내 바란다

translation.en: Our location? Location.
Uh-- She shot out the navigation system.
translation.ko: 위치? 항법 장치가 총에 맞았어 꽉 잡아

translation.en: Hang on.
translation.ko: 항법 장치가 총에 맞았어 꽉 잡아

translation.en: Runstock. Our location is Runstock.
[ MAN ON RADIO ] What's our altitude? What's our altitude?
About 18 inches.
Hello? Hello?
Sorry. I'll just move.
What now, sir?
We'll have to stick to the road.
Let's follow the 1328. There's bound to be a hospital in Dingham.
translation.ko: 이 길을 따라가 1328 국도로 가자고 딩엄 병원이 나올 거야

translation.en: - [ PUDOVKIN GROANING ] - Look after him, Tucker. Look after him.
I think we're losing him, sir. We can't lose him, Tucker.
translation.ko: - 죽을 것 같아요, 선배 - 그자가 죽으면 안 돼, 터커

translation.en: He's our only lead. Try something else.
♪ Don't give up on us, baby ♪
♪ Lord knows we've come this far ♪
[ MUMBLES ] ♪ Stay the way we are ♪ ♪ The angel and the dreamer ♪
♪ Don't give up on us I know ♪
♪ Bom, We could still come through ♪
[ TUCKER ] Look, sir! Follow that ambulance!
Good idea.
Sir. Sir, quickly.
Karlenko. Karlenko!
The second key.
[ STRAINED VOICE ] Vortex... is K.G.B.--
Yes. C.I.A.--
Yes. Yes?
MI7.
Unbelievable. A vole in MI7.
translation.ko: 믿을 수가 없군 MI7 내부에 들쥐가 있어

translation.en: A mole, sir.
What?
There's a mole in MI7.
There's a mole and a vole?
No, sir. There's-- There's a mole, not a vole.
Well, I disagree. There's certainly a vole.
I mean, we know that much.
But what you're saying is there might be a mole as well.
translation.ko: 하지만 자네 말대로 두더지도 있을 것 같군

translation.en: Pegasus.
There's a meeting at MI7 with the prime minister.
And here again, eyes down and to the left, indicating dissent.
translation.ko: 또다시 눈이 왼쪽 아래를 보는데 동의하지 않는다는 뜻이죠

translation.en: With Xiang Ping, it's all about the eyes. Thank you, Ms. Sumner.
translation.ko: 샹핑은 모든 게 눈으로 드러납니다 고마워요, 섬너 양 회담 때 당신도 참석하세요

translation.en: If the talks go ahead, I'd like you with us.
translation.ko: 고마워요, 섬너 양 회담 때 당신도 참석하세요

translation.en: Yes, Prime Minister.
Good evening, gentlemen.
Mr. English. Ms. Sumner.
Right.
So, when is the prime minister going to grace us with his presence?
translation.ko: 수상 각하는 언제 납셔서 이 자리를 빛내주신답니까?

translation.en: I'm the prime minister.
[ SNICKERS ] Yeah, you wish.
Um, all right. So we're all here.
These talks with China are of paramount importance.
Rogue states in Southeast Asia have begun secretly to develop nuclear weapons.
translation.ko: 중국과의 회담은 매우 중요합니다 동남아의 테러 지원국들이 비밀리에 핵무기 개발을 시작했습니다

translation.en: It is vital that we get China onside.
translation.ko: 반드시 중국을 우리 편으로 끌어들여야 합니다

translation.en: Traditionally, China has been impervious to our concerns,
translation.ko: 그동안 중국은 우리의 우려에 관심을 표하지 않았지만

translation.en: but I believe Xiang Ping, given the opportunity,
can and will help defuse this situation.
translation.ko: 우리는 이 상황을 타개할 수 있습니다

translation.en: [ FOREIGN SECRETARY ] Well, with his pro-West stance, it certainly offers an opportunity.
The talks can't go ahead unless we can guarantee his safety.
translation.ko: 그의 안전이 보장되지 않으면 회담은 불가능합니다

translation.en: I believe, with the correct security, that we can.
translation.ko: 그의 안전이 보장되지 않으면 회담은 불가능합니다 안전만 보장된다면 가능하오

translation.en: If Vortex is operational, it's just too dangerous.
I'm inclined to agree, Prime Minister.
translation.ko: 보텍스가 활동하는 한 너무 위험합니다 아무래도 그런 것 같습니다 수상 각하

translation.en: There is a way.
The Swiss are willing to lend us Le Bastion.
That's their government fortress in the Alps.
It's a stunning example of architectural engineering at altitude...
and completely impregnable.
translation.ko: 고지대 건축 기술의 놀라운 결정체이자 외부에서의 침투가 불가능합니다

translation.en: I mean, that should solve all our security issues.
translation.ko: 외부에서의 침투가 불가능합니다 거기라면 안전 문제는 다 해결됩니다

translation.en: Then the talks go ahead.
Pamela, I hope you've brushed up on your Mandarin.
I'd like you in the room with me,
and your best man on security.
Yes, Prime Minister.
Where are we on Vortex?
- English? - Vortex is three men.
Fisher was one, Karlenko was another.
Karlenko was killed today on the orders of the third.
[ PEGASUS ] Any leads?
Yes, but I need time.
We do not have time.
We need to know the identity of the third person in Vortex.
Give me 24 hours.
Another bottle of Romanée-Conti?
Of course. And would you like to choose dessert? Yes. You.
And bring two spoons.
Cheers. Cheers.
Yes.
So, come on, Johnny. What was it you wanted to ask me?
Simon, do you know what this is?
Some sort of key?
Karlenko and Fisher both had one, and they were both killed for them.
translation.ko: 카를렌코와 피셔가 하나씩 갖고 있었는데 둘 다 죽었어

translation.en: Well, I'll... give it to the boys at the lab and see--
Karlenko told me that the third man in Vortex...
translation.ko: 그럼 내가 실험실 친구들에게... 카를렌코가 보텍스의 3번째 인물이 MI7이라고 했어

translation.en: is in MI7.
And you believed him?
Simon, I have to ask you a question... face to face.
Do you have any idea who it might be?
[ CHUCKLING ] Johnny. I thought you were about to accuse me.
translation.ko: 쟈니, 난 자네가 날 지목하는 줄 알았어

translation.en: No! I mean, honestly. What?
translation.ko: 천만에! 말도 안 돼 말이 돼?

translation.en: Simon Ambrose, the evil mastermind! Don't. Stop it!
translation.ko: 사이먼 암브로즈, 사악한 주모자! - 그만해 - 우리 중의 반역자

translation.en: A traitor in our midst! You! You!
translation.ko: - 그만해 - 우리 중의 반역자 자네야, 자네야!

translation.en: Oh! Simon, you are so funny.
[ BUBBLING ] Hysterical.
Oh, my dear. [ PHONE RINGS ]
Would you excuse me for one moment, Simon?
translation.ko: “발신: 터커 화장실로, 긴급!” 사이먼 잠시 실례할게

translation.en: Sir. Tucker, can't this wait?
Sir, it's Ambrose.
Yes, I know it's Ambrose. I'm having dinner with him.
No, he's the third man in Vortex.
[ SNICKERS ] Simon Ambrose?
He went to Eton.
Ah, Simon.
Leave it.
What are you-- Move.
Come on, move. All right.
Tucker.
You said you never knew Karlenko.
That's right.
translation.ko: 카를렌코는 만난 적 없다고 했죠? 그랬지

translation.en: Then how do you explain these?
I hacked into Karlenko's computer. You and him in Mozambique?
translation.ko: 카를렌코의 컴퓨터를 해킹했어요 그와 함께 모잠비크에 있었죠?

translation.en: Sometimes I have trouble myself, old boy. [ CHUCKLES ]
You're Vortex. You're the third man in Vortex.
Tucker, this is ridiculous. Oh--
[ URINATING ] Sorry. I'll be with you in just a tick.
It's true. I was in Mozambique.
[ URINATING CONTINUES ] What?
I was there because of Patch Quartermain.
translation.ko: 내가 거기 간 건 패치 쿼터메인 때문이야

translation.en: Patch? Oh. Sorry. I'll just be one second.
He's the man you're after. [ ZIPPER ZIPS ]
You're bluffing. Sorry.
I work for a secret organization inside MI7...
set up specifically to bring him in.
A secret Secret Service?
Oh, yeah? What's it called?
What's it called?
Armitage.
A secret, secret Secret Service called Armitage?
We answer only to the P.M.
It's extraordinary, Simon.
Indeed it is.
That you'd think for one moment...
that I would fall for such a steaming pile... of old baloney.
translation.ko: 내가 그런 헛소리에 넘어갈 줄 알았나?

translation.en: Well done, Tucker. You're not Spy of the Month for nothing.
translation.ko: 잘했어, 터커 이달의 첩보원에 선정될 만하군

translation.en: Thank you, sir. Here, let me take that.
translation.ko: 잘했어, 터커 이달의 첩보원에 선정될 만하군 - 감사합니다, 선배 - 이건 나한테 맡겨

translation.en: Now go home.
translation.ko: - 감사합니다, 선배 - 이건 나한테 맡겨 그만 집에 가

translation.en: What? You're the one talking baloney.
You're in way over your head, boy. Now run along.
translation.ko: 무슨 말을 지껄이는지도 모르지 그만 가봐

translation.en: No! I won't go, sir. He's lying.
translation.ko: 안 돼요, 선배! 거짓말하는 건 사이먼이에요

translation.en: You've let me down, you've let the service down,
and, frankly, I think you've let yourself down.
translation.ko: 자넨 날 실망시켰고 정보부를 실망시켰고 솔직히 말해서 자네 자신을 실망시켰어

translation.en: But I-- Now get out!
Patch Quartermain, of all people.
Blowing his own legs off? Now that's what I call deep cover.
translation.ko: 패치 쿼터메인이라니 자기 다리를 날려? 진짜 엄청난 위장이군

translation.en: And to think how much I admired him.
He hates you. Really?
He always has.
He thinks you're a moron with no place in MI7.
translation.ko: 패치는 자네가 MI7에 전혀 안 맞는 머저리라고 생각해

translation.en: A jumped-up grammar school nobody. That's why he tried to destroy you.
translation.ko: 시건방진 애송이라고 생각해 그래서 자넬 망치려고 했던 거야

translation.en: Now, Johnny, just because he ruined your life,
translation.ko: 이봐, 쟈니 패치가 자네 인생을 망쳤다고 해서

translation.en: that's no reason for you to go rogue and take him down on your own.
translation.ko: 자네가 직접 그를 처치하는 건 안 돼

translation.en: God forbid I should put a crazy idea like that in your head.
translation.ko: 내 말을 듣고 그런 생각을 품는 것조차도 안 돼

translation.en: Good night, Simon.
Oh, Johnny. That key you showed me-- We might need it to bring him in.
translation.ko: 쟈니, 자네가 가진 열쇠 말이야 패치를 체포하는 데 필요해

translation.en: Thank you. Good night, sir.
Silly tit.
Bingo.
Arrange a meeting with our client. Of course.
Pegasus.
We have the third man.
It's Johnny English.
Hello, Patch.
Looking for forgiveness?
It's all over for you now, English. It's the end of the line.
translation.ko: 자넨 끝났어, 잉글리쉬 이젠 모두 끝났어

translation.en: Yes, you'd like that, wouldn't you, Patch?
After all, I'm just a jumped-up grammar school nobody, aren't I?
translation.ko: 그랬으면 좋겠지, 패치? 어쨌든 난 시건방진 애송이니까, 그렇지?

translation.en: [ CHUCKLES ] What are you talking about?
I know that you are the third man in Vortex.
No, Johnny. You are.
No, you are.
No. You are.
Stand by, all agents.
And it all ends here.
[ PEGASUS ] Take him.
Johnny.
[ WOMAN ] Hey! Watch it!
Got him. Move! Move! [ GRUNTS ]
Don't lose him. Go, go!
Hold!
Heading west into Vine Street. Mobilize all vehicles. Copy that.
translation.ko: 바인 가를 향해 서진 중이다 모든 차량 출동하라

translation.en: Idiot!
You've lost him! I don't believe it.
Who do you think you are?
Gotcha.
[ AGENT ON SPEAKER ] Agent English, pull over! Pull over!
Stop him! Stop!
Get after him!
Kate, I'm not Vortex. I've been framed.
translation.ko: 케이트, 난 보텍스가 아니오 난 누명을 썼소

translation.en: You must believe me.
How will it be done?
Same as in Mozambique. One person, apparently working alone.
translation.ko: 모잠비크처럼요 한 명이 단독으로 처리할 거요

translation.en: Who have you chosen?
Leave that with me.
My account in Zurich.
500 million U.S. dollars, as agreed.
translation.ko: 취리히의 내 계좌요 약속대로 미화 5억 달러를 입금하시오

translation.en: You've been out for hours.
You're lucky it was just a flesh wound.
Look. I'm going to Switzerland tonight, but you can stay here while I'm gone.
translation.ko: 운이 좋았어요 뼈는 안 다쳤어요 난 오늘 밤 스위스로 떠나요 내가 없는 동안 여기 있어도 돼요

translation.en: [ GRUNTS ] Mm-hmm. Mm-hmm.
translation.ko: 난 오늘 밤 스위스로 떠나요 내가 없는 동안 여기 있어도 돼요

translation.en: I've been going through the news footage from the night Chambal was killed.
translation.ko: 샹발 대통령이 암살되던 날 밤 이후의 뉴스 보도 내용을 살펴봤어요

translation.en: Ah.
And there's something not right.
Seconds after President Chambal was shot,
the assassin collapses and dies.
- [ GROANS ] - And the autopsy says heart failure.
But-- [ MUTTERING ] if you go through the classified CCTV footage--
translation.ko: 하지만 비밀 폐쇄회로 TV 영상을 보면...

translation.en: You all right?
Yeah, fine.
Take a look at this.
Fifteen minutes before the assassination-- Look. He's manic.
translation.ko: 암살 15분 전 이자가 온몸을 부들부들 떨어요

translation.en: He's completely lost control of his body.
And then-- suddenly-- catatonic.
Here-- Wait.
There.
Someone was talking to him.
translation.ko: 봐요 누가 그에게 얘길 하고 있어요

translation.en: I don't think he had any idea what he was doing.
translation.ko: 자기가 무슨 짓을 하는지 전혀 몰라요

translation.en: I think Vortex's secret weapon...
Is a mind control drug.
And only one fits the symptoms.
Timox--
translation.ko: “티목셀린 바브부테놀 금지 약물” 티목스... 티목실린 부비...

translation.en: Timoxeline Barebut--
Timoxeline Barbebutenol.
The C.I.A. ordered its destruction 10 years ago.
And the agent in charge of its disposal--
translation.ko: CIA가 10년 전에 폐기 명령을 내렸어요 폐기를 책임진 요원이...

translation.en: Titus Fisher.
I don't know how to thank you.
I'd love a takeaway.
Consider it done.
Fly low.
So, Johnny, what are you going to do about Vortex?
[ SIGHS ] I don't know.
translation.ko: 쟈니, 보텍스를 어떻게 할 거예요? 글쎄요, 사이먼이 있었다면 무슨 수를 냈을 텐데

translation.en: If only Simon was here. He'd know what to do.
translation.ko: 글쎄요, 사이먼이 있었다면 무슨 수를 냈을 텐데

translation.en: Why do you think he's better than you?
Come-- Well, the man's a god.
Well, I prefer mortals.
Pure, complicated, maddening mortals.
I've come to realize that what's really exciting to me...
translation.ko: 이젠 깨달았어요 저를 정말로 흥분시키는 건

translation.en: is great loyalty, determination... and courage.
You have always fascinated me... clinically.
But now you--
Ms. Sumner, your pupils are dilating.
Are they?
Your cheeks are coloring.
Eye contact deepening.
Heart rate rising.
Ms. Sumner, I believe we're emotionally... leaking.
translation.ko: 섬너 양 우린 감정을 누설하고 있소

translation.en: The bedroom-- quickly. Oh, absolutely.
[ DOORBELL RINGS ] Now!
Hello? [ SIMON ] Hello.
Oh, Simon. Hi, Kate.
Are you ready? I'll drive you to the airport.
Oh, how nice. I'll just get my bag.
translation.ko: 준비됐소? 공항까지 태워줄게요 친절하네요 가방 갖고 나올게요

translation.en: [ WHISPERING ] Should I-- Are you alone?
[ WHISPERS ] No. [ LOUDER ] Of course.
Been working?
Been brushing up on the Chinese P.M. You?
translation.ko: 중국 총리에 관한 조사를 하고 있었어요, 당신은요?

translation.en: Oh, we're trying to track down Johnny English.
There are some questions we want to ask him... about Vortex.
translation.ko: 보텍스에 관해 놈에게 물어볼 게 몇 가지 있소

translation.en: I don't suppose you've seen him, have you? No.
Not hiding him away?
Not my type. [ CHUCKLES ] Shall we?
Ambrose.
There's a Mr. Adams to see you, Colin.
Hello, Tucker. What are you doing here?
Every agent in the country's after you.
translation.ko: - 안녕, 터커 - 여긴 웬일이에요? 이 나라의 모든 요원이 선배를 쫓고 있어요

translation.en: We were right about Ambrose.
What do you mean "we"?
If we act fast, we can-- You wouldn't listen, would you?
translation.ko: 우리가 서두르면... 내 말 안 들었잖아요

translation.en: You think you know it all. Well, you don't!
translation.ko: 내 말 안 들었잖아요 다 아는 것처럼 구시더니 아니네요!

translation.en: Being an agent means everything to me.
translation.ko: 정보부 요원이 되는 게 제 꿈이었어요

translation.en: And, thanks to you, I'm suspended!
Would you boys like some orange squash?
No, thank you. No, thanks, Mum.
Tucker, Ambrose is in Switzerland. We are in Tooting.
translation.ko: 터커, 암브로즈는 스위스에 있고 우린 투팅에 있어

translation.en: I am here because my country needs me.
translation.ko: 내가 여기 온 건 조국이 날 필요로 하기 때문이지

translation.en: And because it needs you too.
Royce. [ WOMAN'S VOICE ] Ready, sir.
Come.
Obstruction detected.
Set the sat nav for Switzerland. Let's kick some bottom.
translation.ko: 위성 항법장치를 스위스로 맞춰 놈들의 엉덩이를 걷어차자고

translation.en: [ ROYCE ] You have arrived at your destination.
Good luck, sir.
Le Bastion.
One way up, one way down.
[ JOHNNY ] Come on. Let's get the stuff.
Whoa, look. The T2 ground-to-air missile.
That's a D7 bulletproof shield.
Take it from me, Tucker. I was working with these
while you were stringing conkers.
translation.ko: 자네가 젖병 빨 때 난 그거 갖고 일했으니까

translation.en: The P-8 grapple hook?
Check.
Estimated height? Thirty-five feet.
All yours, Tucker.
Can I just say, sir,
this is just great.
Well, go on.
The D-16 ascender, and up we go.
Are you sure that's the ascender, sir?
Yes, yes. I'd know it anywhere.
[ MALE VOICE ] Agent in distress. Agent in distress.
Agent in distress. Agent in distress.
I am over here.
Shut up! Shut up!
[ ECHOING ] I am over here.
[ MALE VOICE ] Activating visual locator.
Three, two, one.
[ MAN ] Intruders in Sector 4.
Dear God, let me not die at the hands of the Swiss.
translation.ko: 하느님, 스위스인들의 손에 죽게 하지 마시옵소서

translation.en: [ JOHNNY ] Tucker, now listen.
I want you to attack me. What?
translation.ko: 터커, 잘 들어 날 공격해 - 네? - 그런 다음

translation.en: After a struggle, you can "arrest me"...
translation.ko: - 네? - 그런 다음 날 체포해서 저 안으로 끌고 들어가

translation.en: and take me inside as your prisoner.
translation.ko: 날 체포해서 저 안으로 끌고 들어가

translation.en: Sir, I can't. Tucker, that's an order.
translation.ko: - 안 돼요, 선배 - 터커, 이건 명령이야

translation.en: Hit me. Hit me.
Come on. Harder.
[ GROANS ] Better, sir? Yes, much better. [ GASPS ]
I see how people get the taste for this.
I've got a better idea! I'll shoot you!
translation.ko: 더 좋은 생각이 있어요 총으로 쏠게요!

translation.en: [ GROANING ] No! No! No!
Die, Vortex scum! - Tucker! - [ MAN SHOUTS ]
Agent Tucker!
It's Johnny English.
Bag him.
The glass can withstand mortar attack.
The door is one-way. You can get out, but no one gets in.
translation.ko: 문은 일방통행이에요 나올 수는 있어도 들어갈 순 없어요

translation.en: [ OVER SPEAKER ] Excellent.
You ready, Slater?
I'll, uh, have them send refreshments to your room...
when you're ready, Pegasus.
translation.ko: 준비되시면 당신 방으로 음료수를 보내죠 페가수스

translation.en: Thank you, Agent One.
I'll take it from here, boys.
Hold it right there!
Let me see your I.D. Um--
[ JOHNNY WHISPERS ] Excuse me. What the--
Stop!
Warning: This is a designated conflict zone.
Sir? Sir?
[ PEGASUS ] Thank you so much. You're welcome, Pegasus.
Pegasus.
Go on. Go on.
What the hell is that?
Sir? Sir?
English! Pegasus.
They're going to make you kill Xiang Ping!
You're insane!
Agent One, thank God.
He won't help you.
He's the third member of Vortex.
Aren't you, Simon?
Here to give you some Timoxy Bubby--
Timoxy Bubby-- Bubby-- [ SPUTTERING ]
Timoxy Bubby-- [ SPUTTERING ]
To give you a drug... that will make you obey his every command.
translation.ko: 당신에게 약을 먹여서 자기 명령을 듣게 할 참이었어요

translation.en: I'm intrigued, Simon.
How exactly were you going to administer it?
By injection?
Some hideous gas through the air vents?
Or by spiking her drink?
Timoxeline Barbebutenol.
He'll enter the manic phase any moment now.
[ CHUCKLES ] I have to warn you... that I've been trained to resist this kind of thing.
translation.ko: 경고하는데 난 이런 약물에 저항하는 훈련을 받았어

translation.en: You swine! [ SPUTTERING ]
Agent One, what's going on?
Oh, he's quite harmless at this phase.
The drug will kill him.
translation.ko: 이 단계에서는 별로 위험하지 않아요 저 친구는 약물 때문에 죽겠지만

translation.en: But just before it does, there will be a short window...
translation.ko: 저 친구는 약물 때문에 죽겠지만 그 직전에 잠깐 제가 시키는 건 뭐든지 하죠

translation.en: where he'll do everything I tell him to.
translation.ko: 그 직전에 잠깐 제가 시키는 건 뭐든지 하죠

translation.en: Poor Johnny.
You were never really MI7, Johnny.
You were never really one of us.
And now you're about to become our most famous agent.
translation.ko: 곧 역사상 가장 유명한 MI7 요원이 되겠군

translation.en: You'll now do exactly as I tell you.
translation.ko: 이제 내가 시키는 걸 정확히 수행해

translation.en: You are a traitor to the service and to your country.
translation.ko: 이제 내가 시키는 걸 정확히 수행해 자넨 정보부와 조국을 배신했어

translation.en: Shut her up, old chap.
Duck. What?
I warned you.
Okay, Slater. Let's get him ready.
Ready.
Premier Ping, it's a pleasure to finally meet you.
You had a pleasant flight, I trust?
[ OVER SPEAKER ] I was just asking the premier if he had a pleasant flight.
Kate, Johnny's back on the team. What?
It's all checked out, and the P.M. and the Chinese have approved it.
translation.ko: 네? 확인 다 끝났어요 수상 각하와 중국 측도 승인했소

translation.en: Approved what? He's standing in for Pamela.
translation.ko: 확인 다 끝났어요 수상 각하와 중국 측도 승인했소 - 승인요? - 쟈니가 파멜라를 대신해요

translation.en: Isn't it great? [ EXHALES ]
Excuse me. Agent Tucker.
[ PRIME MINISTER ] Good. Good. And your wife is well?
[ SIMON ] Lock it up, Johnny.
[ PRIME MINISTER ] Wonderful. Wonderful.
[ SIMON ] That's it.
Premier, I am most grateful you have agreed to meet me at this time.
translation.ko: 총리 각하, 이렇게 절 만나주셔서 정말 감사합니다

translation.en: It is our pleasure. [ SPEAKING CHINESE ]
Maintain that tone, Prime Minister.
Avoid confrontation. Keep eye contact.
I can assure you that the Chinese people...
have always regarded the British people... as completely horrible.
Honorable. Honorable.
Completely honorable.
Of course.
I was very keen to meet.
Johnny, stand up and go to the water table.
Premier, I believe the... present danger can be averted if we act swiftly.
translation.ko: 각하, 우리가 신속히 대응한다면 현재의 위험을 타개할 수 있습니다

translation.en: Go to your right pocket.
We designed it for Pegasus.
Well, it's too bloody late now.
Just act natural.
Prime Minister-- Something's wrong.
China does not respond well to advice--
Pull out the barrel.
Now, Johnny, I want you to kill Xiang Ping.
Oh, dear God, no.
He's being controlled. [ FOREIGN SECRETARY ] By who?
Ambrose.
Shoot Xiang Ping!
Mind... must be master of the body.
[ SIMON ] He's resisting it.
His left hand is fighting the right hand.
Come on, Johnny.
[ TUCKER ] If I can interrupt the frequency,
I could stop Ambrose from communicating with him.
translation.ko: 암브로즈와 쟈니의 통신을 막을 수 있어요

translation.en: English, stand up!
Come on, come on.
He'll be dead in 50 seconds, sir.
- Tucker! - [ COMPUTER WHIRRING ]
Come on.
- Pull the trigger! - I'm in.
♪ [ SPEAKERS: "WORD UP" ]
Listen to me. This is Simon Ambrose. [ OVER SPEAKER ] I order you to shoot Xiang Ping!
translation.ko: 잘 들어, 난 사이먼 암브로즈다 샹핑의 사살을 명한다!

translation.en: Ten seconds, sir.
Fire!
Go, go, go.
Time to get out of here.
Hold your fire!
Stand down!
- His pulse is dropping. - Don't lose him.
- Come on, sir. - [ BEEPING, SLOWER ]
[ TIBETAN TEACHER ] Open your heart, English, and you shall be reborn.
translation.ko: 마음을 열어라, 잉글리쉬 그리하면 다시 태어나리라

translation.en: Almost there.
Thank you, Kate.
I was passing.
Sir. Tucker!
Welcome back, sir.
Thank you, Tucker.
I won't kiss you, if you don't mind.
Well, whatever.
Where's Ambrose?
English?
Sir? What are you doing, sir?
Guideline 17-5. Never question a senior agent in the field.
translation.ko: 근무수칙 17-5: 작전 중인 선배 요원께 토 달지 말 것

translation.en: No!
translation.ko: 근무수칙 17-5: 작전 중인 선배 요원께 토 달지 말 것 안 돼요!

translation.en: Ambrose, you five-star turd.
Another balls-up, Johnny.
What's the matter with you?
It's all over, Ambrose.
You can betray your country, you can cheat your friends,
translation.ko: 조국도 배신할 수 있고 친구들도 속일 수 있지만

translation.en: but you can't get away from Johnny Eng--
translation.ko: 쟈니 잉글리쉬로부터는 절대 도망 못 가...

translation.en: So long, Johnny!
The D7.
The bulletproof shield!
[ GUNSHOTS CONTINUE ] Hey! What? It's not working!
It's the T2, sir!
Is he-- It's the T2!
translation.ko: - 오, 아직 살아 있어! - 지대공 미사일이오!

translation.en: Close it. Close it!
- Stupid thing! - [ BEEPS, ARMS ]
Oh, Johnny.
The T2.
Tucker. You clever boy.
[ PRIME MINISTER ] I couldn't be more delighted.
Vortex's paymasters have been arrested,
and China has expressed its gratitude to both Britain and the service.
We owe English a great deal.
Well, reinstating his knighthood is a truly lovely gesture.
translation.ko: 그의 작위를 복원한 건 정말 잘한 일이에요

translation.en: And it'll mean the world to him.
Her Majesty will be with him shortly.
Gotcha. Gotcha.
Got you! You old hag! [ SHRIEKING ]
[ JOHNNY ] I've just about had enough of you, you old cow!
translation.ko: 정말 지겨워 이 소 같은 할망구!

translation.en: You're going nowhere! Pegasus!
English! It's her!
translation.ko: 잉글리쉬! 이 여자가 살인자 청소부예요! 마침내 잡았어요!

translation.en: It's the killer cleaner! [ SOBBING ] Finally, I've got her!
translation.ko: 이 여자가 살인자 청소부예요! 마침내 잡았어요!

translation.en: You never know when it's over, do you?
Well, it's over! Over! [ GASPING ]
translation.ko: 이번 기회에 확실히 끝장을 보자고 이제 끝났어, 끝났어 끝났어, 끝났어!

translation.en: Over! Over! Over! [ POUNDING CONTINUES ]
I don't know how to thank you.
I'd love a takeaway.
Consider it done.
